issue.title: [CF 785] Version notification improvement
issue.body:
TellMeWhen is currently notifying for all revisions detected higher than the present one. The fact is seen in TMW:OnCommReceived().
However, some players prefer Release version, and some players prefer Alpha or Beta. For majority players who is using Release, which is the default preference of Curse Client, they will get version notification from Alpha users. Improvement could be made by detecting Alpha or Beta version notification on a release version, or comparing major and minor version number only.


> Posted by CurseForge user Tellaurea | Imported from CurseForge issue #785 | Raw

comments.body:
Good idea. Done in r762.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
